publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5058 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Scottish Commissioner for Human Rights (Scotland) Billâ€”That the Parliament agrees that, during Stage 3 of the Scottish Commissioner for Human Rights Bill, debate on groups of amendments shall, subject to Rule 9.8.4A, be brought to a conclusion by the time limit indicated, that time limit being calculated from when the Stage begins and excluding any periods when other business is under consideration or when the meeting of the Parliament is suspended (other than a suspension following the first division in the Stage being called) or otherwise not in progress: Group 1: 50 minutes Group 2: 1 hour 20 minutes Groups 3 to 5: 1 hour 45 minutes Groups 6 and 7: 2 hours 20 minutes. Supported by: George Lyon*
